why
now?

Picture: Bahadur Raichur Rahaman


Our Vision:

Foster equitable access to on-demand knowledge for everyone by utilizing appropriate media, promoting constructive public dialogue, and empowering citizen engagement for advancing digital democracy in the context of the Fourth Industrial Revolution.

Our Mission

Enable a media and digital development that fosters a literate, informed, and participatory society, allowing underserved communities to shape their lives and livelihoods through the following:
• Promoting public discourse, encouraging media diversity, and strengthening democracy through the effective use of human-centric digital technology.
• Empowering & amplifying the voices of vulnerable, marginalized, and excluded communities in discussions on development & Digital for Development.
• Collaborating with media and knowledge stakeholders to empower individuals and communities to create positive changes in their lives and livelihoods.
• Serving as a knowledge hub that is both locally rooted and globally connected.

House: 9/4 Road: 2 Shaymoli Dhaka 1207, Bangladesh
